item.title: Low carb & keto what about cholesterol
item.description: What I’ve Learned This content creator puts out some good research pertaining to new science developments in the field of nutrition. Cholesterol is a hot topic, one of the major points of the nay sayers when discussing a diet low in carbs, high in saturated fats. Eating LCHF may increase your cholesterol; however, there’s much more to cholesterol than what we’ve been told. This video helps to put things into perspective.

item.title: Low Carb & Cholesterol
item.description: Dr. Paul Mason This is one of the best videos explaining cholesterol. Our medical professionals are perpetuating incorrect information propagated in the late 1950s by Ancel Keys who used selective world epidemiology studies to encourage the low fat diet. Cholesterol does not clog arteries, stating this is the equivalent of stating fireman start fires.
